content.description: Start on a mostly flat gravel platform and climb limestone edges past 8 bolts and end below a giant roof.Â
content.location: Entering the gap from the east, this route will be on the left side of the road about halfway in. The anchors are several feet below a giant roof. The first bolt is stamped with a steel token that says "Skin Yamaka 5.11a". It is just to the left of the route "Lackawanna Roof 5.11b" which is also stamped.

content.description: Get some bodies douse in gasoline and ignite.  Middle of the wall directly up from the parking area.  The route is very fresh and quite sharp wear a helmet. Watch out for coyotes.
content.location: North end of Hercules Gap east side of the road. Approach directly up the hill towards the largest feature then look for a trail of small animal bones.

content.description: *If you climb this route, please provide more information!
content.location: Entering the gap from the southeast, this route will be on the left side of the road about halfway in. The anchors are just outside of a small cave and above and right of a giant roof. The first bolt is stamped with a steel token that says "Miller Time 5.12". It is just to the right of the route "Lackawanna Roof 5.11b" which is also stamped.

content.description: *If you climb this route, please provide a description!
content.protection: (P1) 8 Bolts to a Bolted Anchor (P2) Unknown
content.location: Entering the gap from the southeast, this route will be on the left side of the road about halfway in. The anchors are several feet below a giant roof. The first bolt is stamped with a steel token that says "Lakawana Roof 5.11b". It is just to the right of the route "Skin Yamaka 5.11a" which is also stamped.

content.description: Climb the corner on the right side of a slab and go through the chock stone cave.  Belay at the tree.
content.location: At the far east end of Hercules Gap, on the south side of the road.  Park at first turnout at start of gap.

content.description: Limestone slot canyon that is split by a low traffic paved road.
